# UITitlebarTitleVisibility.visible

**Case**

A state indicating that the title is visible in the title bar.

## Declaration

```swift
case visible
```

## Visibility states

- **UITitlebarTitleVisibility.hidden**: A state indicating that the title isn’t visible in the title bar.

items.description: A state indicating that the title isn’t visible in the title bar.
items.name: UITitlebarTitleVisibility.hidden
